ActCanada Student Financial Assistance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS in order to reduce the administrative burden on students by simplifying the student loan and grant disbursement process; and, support the Government of Canadaâ€™s Service Delivery Vision, announced in Budget 2008, to modernize and simplify the Canada Student Loans Program by streamlining the administration of student financial assistance.
